column2: Limbach Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of commercial specialty contractor services in the areas of heating, ventilation, air-conditioning (HVAC); plumbing; electrical and building controls for the design and construction of new and renovated buildings; maintenance services; energy retrofits; and equipment upgrades. The company is headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and currently employs 550 full-time employees. The firm provides building infrastructure services with a focus on design, installation and maintenance of heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC), and mechanical, electrical and plumbing systems for a group of commercial and institutional building owners. The firm offers concept design and engineering through system commissioning and recurring around the clock service and maintenance. The company partners with building owners, construction managers, general contractors and energy service companies.
